MAN.TITLE: laplace
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Calculates convolution of input image with Laplacian operator.

DESCRIPTION.P: laplaceThe function Laplace calculates the convolution of the input image "ima_in" with the Laplacian kernel of a specified size apertureSize and stores the result in "ima_out".
